content.description: Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.

content.description: Provides a simple, yet effective way to route to APIs in Servlet-based applications. Provides cross-cutting concerns to those APIs such as security, monitoring/metrics, and resiliency.

content.name: Reactive Gateway
content.description: Provides a simple, yet effective way to route to APIs in reactive applications. Provides cross-cutting concerns to those APIs such as security, monitoring/metrics, and resiliency.

content.name: Cloud Bus
content.description: Links nodes of a distributed system with a lightweight message broker which can used to broadcast state changes or other management instructions (requires a binder, e.g. Apache Kafka or RabbitMQ).

content.name: Cloud Stream
content.description: Framework for building highly scalable event-driven microservices connected with shared messaging systems (requires a binder, e.g. Apache Kafka, Apache Pulsar, RabbitMQ, or Solace PubSub+).

content.description: Config client on VMware Tanzu Application Service.

content.description: Spring Security integration with Azure Active Directory for authentication.

content.description: Fully managed NoSQL database service for modern app development, including Spring Data support.

content.description: All key vault features are supported, e.g. manage application secrets and certificates.

content.name: Azure Storage
content.description: All Storage features are supported, e.g. blob, fileshare and queue.

content.name: Google Cloud Support
content.description: Contains auto-configuration support for every Google Cloud integration. Most of the auto-configuration code is only enabled if other dependencies are added to the classpath.

content.name: Google Cloud Messaging
content.description: Adds the Google Cloud Support entry and all the required dependencies so that the Google Cloud Pub/Sub integration work out of the box.

content.name: Google Cloud Storage
content.description: Adds the Google Cloud Support entry and all the required dependencies so that the Google Cloud Storage integration work out of the box.

content.name: Azure OpenAI
content.description: Spring AI support for Azures OpenAI offering, powered by ChatGPT. It extends beyond traditional OpenAI capabilities, delivering AI-driven text generation with enhanced functionality.

content.name: Azure AI Search
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Azure AI Search. It is an AI-powered information retrieval platform and part of Microsofts larger AI platform. Among other features, it allows users to query information using vector-based storage and retrieval.

content.name: Amazon Bedrock
content.description: Spring AI support for Amazon Bedrock. It is a managed service that provides foundation models from various AI providers, available through a unified API.

content.name: Chroma Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Chroma. It is an open-source embedding database and gives you the tools to store document embeddings, content, and metadata. It also allows to search through those embeddings, including metadata filtering.

content.name: Milvus Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Milvus. It is an open-source vector database that has garnered significant attention in the fields of data science and machine learning. One of its standout features lies in its robust support for vector indexing and querying.

content.name: Mistral AI
content.description: Spring AI support for Mistral AI, the open and portable generative AI for devs and businesses.

content.name: Neo4J Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Neo4j's Vector Search. It allows users to query vector embeddings from large datasets.

content.name: Ollama
content.description: Spring AI support for Ollama. It allows you to run various Large Language Models (LLMs) locally and generate text from them.

content.name: OpenAI
content.description: Spring AI support for ChatGPT, the AI language model and DALL-E, the Image generation model from OpenAI.

content.name: PGvector Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for PGvector. It is an open-source extension for PostgreSQL that enables storing and searching over machine learning-generated embeddings.

content.name: Pinecone Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Pinecone. It is a popular cloud-based vector database and allows you to store and search vectors efficiently.

content.name: PostgresML
content.description: Spring AI support for the PostgresML text embeddings models.

content.name: Redis Search and Query Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Redis Search and Query.It extends the core features of Redis OSS and allows you to use Redis as a vector database.

content.name: Stability AI
content.description: Spring AI support for Stability AI's text to image generation model.

content.name: Transformers (ONNX) Embeddings
content.description: Spring AI support for pre-trained transformer models, serialized into the Open Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) format.

content.name: Vertex AI PaLM2
content.description: Spring AI support for Google Vertex PaLM2 chat and embedding models.

content.name: Vertex AI Gemini
content.description: Spring AI support for Google Vertex Gemini chat.

content.name: Qdrant Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Qdrant. It is an open-source, high-performance vector search engine/database.

content.name: Weaviate Vector Database
content.description: Spring AI vector database support for Weaviate, an open-source vector database. It allows you to store data objects and vector embeddings from your favorite ML-models and scale seamlessly into billions of data objects.

content.name: Timefold Solver
content.description: AI solver to optimize operations and scheduling.

links.description: Timetabling sample. Assign lessons to timeslots and rooms to produce a better schedule for teachers and students

content.description: Generate a Gradle based project archive using the Groovy DSL.
